function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate employee training and education levels may lead to ineffective delivery of new services, such as online cooking classes and web-based services.","Impact":"Lower customer satisfaction, potential decrease in revenue, higher risk of staff turnover.","Mitigation":"Invest in comprehensive training programs, offer incentives for skill development, and create job roles that align with employee capabilities.","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual training tools, and customer service management systems.","People":"Employees working in restaurants and related establishments, particularly those in part-time positions.","Owner":"Employers, human resources departments, and training managers."},{"Description":"Significant decrease in demand for air travel and car rental services due to the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Financial losses, reduced employment opportunities, and potential business closures.","Mitigation":"Diversify service offerings, explore alternative revenue streams, and implement cost-saving measures.","Technologies":"Digital marketing platforms, remote booking systems, and contactless service options.","People":"Employees in the air travel and car rental industries, as well as customers and businesses reliant on these services.","Owner":"Airline and car rental company executives, marketing and operations teams, and government stakeholders."}]}
